bibl.title: The Shifting Sands of History: Interpretations of Ptolemaic Egypt. (Publications of the Association of Ancient Historians. 2.)
bibl.note: Analyse de l'historiographie moderne, en part. du point de vue des relations entre groupes ethniques et du développement du régime monarchique.
Samuel Alan E., The Shifting Sands of History: Interpretations of Ptolemaic Egypt. (Publications of the Association of Ancient Historians. 2.)
Lanham - New York - London, University Press of America, 1989, 8°, xiii-85 pp.
